verses.text: \w The|strong="H0834"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* Lamuel. \w The|strong="H0834"\w* vision wherewith \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w instructed|strong="H3256"\w* \w him|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w What|strong="H4100"\w*, \w O|strong="H1248"\w* \w my|strong="H4100"\w* beloved, \w what|strong="H4100"\w*, \w O|strong="H1248"\w* \w the|strong="H4100"\w* beloved \w of|strong="H5088"\w* \w my|strong="H4100"\w* \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*, \w what|strong="H4100"\w*, \w O|strong="H1248"\w* \w the|strong="H4100"\w* beloved \w of|strong="H5088"\w* \w my|strong="H4100"\w* \w vows|strong="H5088"\w*?

\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* thy \w substance|strong="H2428"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* thy \w riches|strong="H2428"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* destroy \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*.

Give \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, O Lamuel, give \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*: because there \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w no|strong="H0408"\w* secret where drunkenness reigneth:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* judgments, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* pervert \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cause|strong="H1779"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* poor.

\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w strong|strong="H7941"\w* \w drink|strong="H7941"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w are|strong="H5315"\w* sad: \w and|strong="H3196"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w are|strong="H5315"\w* grieved \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w mind|strong="H5315"\w*:

\w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w them|strong="H5750"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, \w and|strong="H8354"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* want, \w and|strong="H8354"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* sorrow \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*.

\w Open|strong="H6605"\w* thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dumb, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* causes \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* pass.

\w Open|strong="H6605"\w* thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w decree|strong="H6310"\w* \w that|strong="H6310"\w* which \w is|strong="H6664"\w* \w just|strong="H6664"\w*, \w and|strong="H6041"\w* do \w justice|strong="H6664"\w* \w to|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* \w needy|strong="H0034"\w* \w and|strong="H6041"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w a|strong="H4672"\w* \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*? \w far|strong="H7350"\w* \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w from|strong="H0802"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* uttermost coasts \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* \w price|strong="H4377"\w* \w of|strong="H0802"\w* \w her|strong="H0802"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3808"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* her \w husband|strong="H1167"\w* trusteth \w in|strong="H0982"\w* her, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H0982"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w need|strong="H2637"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w spoils|strong="H7998"\w*.

\w She|strong="H2896"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* render \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w*.

She hath \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* \w wool|strong="H6785"\w* \w and|strong="H3709"\w* \w flax|strong="H6593"\w*, \w and|strong="H3709"\w* hath wrought \w by|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H1875"\w* counsel \w of|strong="H3709"\w* her \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*.

She \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* merchantâ€™s \w ship|strong="H0591"\w*, she bringeth \w her|strong="H0935"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w afar|strong="H4801"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w she|strong="H6965"\w* hath \w risen|strong="H6965"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w prey|strong="H2964"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* victuals \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w maidens|strong="H5291"\w*.

She hath considered \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* bought \w it|strong="H3947"\w*: \w with|strong="H3709"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* she hath \w planted|strong="H5193"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*.

She hath \w girded|strong="H2296"\w* \w her|strong="H0553"\w* \w loins|strong="H4975"\w* \w with|strong="H2296"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*, \w and|strong="H4975"\w* hath \w strengthened|strong="H0553"\w* \w her|strong="H0553"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*.

\w She|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w tasted|strong="H2938"\w* \w and|strong="H3915"\w* seen \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w* traffic \w is|strong="H2896"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*: \w her|strong="H3588"\w* \w lamp|strong="H5216"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H3518"\w* out \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

She hath \w put|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* strong things, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* fingers \w have|strong="H3027"\w* taken \w hold|strong="H8551"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w spindle|strong="H6418"\w*.

She hath opened \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w needy|strong="H0034"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w stretched|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w her|strong="H7971"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*.

\w She|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* cold \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w snow|strong="H7950"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* domestics \w are|strong="H1004"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* double garments.

She hath \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H8336"\w* herself \w clothing|strong="H3830"\w* \w of|strong="H3830"\w* tapestry: \w fine|strong="H8336"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, \w and|strong="H0713"\w* \w purple|strong="H0713"\w* \w is|strong="H3830"\w* her \w covering|strong="H3830"\w*.

\w Her|strong="H3045"\w* \w husband|strong="H1167"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* honourable \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, \w when|strong="H3427"\w* \w he|strong="H0776"\w* sitteth \w among|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* senators \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

She \w made|strong="H6213"\w* fine \w linen|strong="H5466"\w*, \w and|strong="H5466"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H5466"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* girdle \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* Chanaanite.

\w Strength|strong="H5797"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* beauty \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w her|strong="H3117"\w* \w clothing|strong="H3830"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* she \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w laugh|strong="H7832"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w latter|strong="H0314"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

She hath \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* clemency \w is|strong="H2451"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*.

\w She|strong="H3808"\w* hath looked \w well|strong="H6822"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* paths \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H0398"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* \w her|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* idle.

\w Her|strong="H0833"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w rose|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w called|strong="H0833"\w* \w her|strong="H0833"\w* \w blessed|strong="H0833"\w*: \w her|strong="H0833"\w* \w husband|strong="H1167"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1121"\w* \w praised|strong="H1984"\w* \w her|strong="H0833"\w*.

\w Many|strong="H7227"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* gathered \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w riches|strong="H2428"\w*: thou hast surpassed \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*.

Favour \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w deceitful|strong="H8267"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w vain|strong="H1892"\w*: \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* feareth \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w praised|strong="H1984"\w*.

\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w works|strong="H4639"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*.
